channel.title: Initial release v0.1
channel.description: It is getting good reviews so far on the market, what do you think of it? What can be improved besides file selection that I already plan to implement?

item.title: Initial release v0.1
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:2, topic:345836”]It did what it was supposed to do great, took like 2 seconds, and that’s a lot faster than the other apps(ever if it is only listing them in a text file). Honestly, I prefer names over the apk files because half the time when you go to restore them, they’re outdated.

And I know it says be patient, but a progress bar might be a nice bonus for future versions? :)[/quote]

Not only are the apk files usually outdated when you go to restore them, they don’t show up in the market so you can’t get updates, AND they take up a lot more space than a text file.

And yes, I was planning on implementing a progress bar in the near future, thanks for the feedback!

Read full topic

item.title: Initial release v0.1
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

It did what it was supposed to do great, took like 2 seconds, and that’s a lot faster than the other apps(ever if it is only listing them in a text file). Honestly, I prefer names over the apk files because half the time when you go to restore them, they’re outdated.

And I know it says be patient, but a progress bar might be a nice bonus for future versions?

Read full topic
